abstract: Among the actors and the books they will read: Naomi Watts, "Summer," by Edith Wharton; Dustin Hoffman, "Being There," by Jerzy Kosinski; and Samuel L. Jackson, "A Rage in Harlem," by Chester Himes.
snippet: Among the actors and the books they will read: Naomi Watts, "Summer," by Edith Wharton; Dustin Hoffman, "Being There," by Jerzy Kosinski; and Samuel L. Jackson, "A Rage in Harlem," by Chester Himes.
lead_paragraph: Would you listen to a recording of "The End of the Affair" that lasted hours? What if Colin Firth were reading it?

headline.main: Stars Will Read Amazon Unit's New Audio Book Series
